author: Techlore
description:
Learn how to safely open potentially malicious PDFs, images, and documents using Dangerzone, a free open-source security tool created by Micah Lee. This tutorial shows you exactly how to install and use Dangerzone with Docker to sandbox suspicious files and create safe visual representations without risking your computer. Techlore empowers individuals with practical digital privacy knowledge, security tools, and advocacy resources. Discover how to protect your online data and regain control of your digital identity.
